LanguageData.BiosculptingSickness.label: Biosculpting sickness
LanguageData.BiosculptingSickness.description: The after-effects of an incomplete biosculpting cycle. It causes nausea, dizziness, and fuzzy thinking.
LanguageData.Blindfold.label: blindfolded
LanguageData.Blindfold.description: A blindfold is blocking this person's vision.
LanguageData.NeuralSupercharge.label: neural supercharge
LanguageData.NeuralSupercharge.description: An externally-induced increase in sensitivity and synchronicity of neurons. This boosts consciousness and learning rate at the cost of increased hunger.
LanguageData.TortureCrown.label: torture crown
LanguageData.TortureCrown.description: A crown-like headpiece with stubby spikes that poke the head uncomfortably. It is used to put the wearer in pain.
LanguageData.WorkFocus.label: work focus
LanguageData.WorkFocus.description: This person was energized by a ritual or event they participated in. The energy means they can now work harder.
